tool_description:
With the Voter Card Verification API, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that the individuals you onboard are holding a valid Voter Card issued by the Government of India, are eligible to vote, and have provided you with reliable identity and address proofs.

Couple it with our Voter Card OCR API to make your identity verification process seamless and instant!
title: Voter Card Verifications

api_list.name: Get Call
api_list.description: Get call is to be made by appending request id to the url in the query parameter, to fetch the api results.

api_list.name: Voter Card Verifications
api_list.description:
With the Voter Card Verification API, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that the individuals you onboard are holding a valid Voter Card issued by the Government of India, are eligible to vote, and have provided you with reliable identity and address proofs.

Couple it with our Voter Card OCR API to make your identity verification process seamless and instant!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://voter-card-verifications.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_voter_id"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "voter-card-verifications.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://voter-card-verifications.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_voter_id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "voter-card-verifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
